Package ohos.media.sessioncore

Class AVBrowserService

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.app.AbilityContext
      • ohos.aafwk.ability.Ability
        • ohos.media.sessioncore.AVBrowserService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILifecycle, Context

    public abstract class AVBrowserService
extends Ability
    Base class used to access the media browser service.

    The media browser service enables your application to browse and play media items from another application.

    To extend this class, you need to configure the config.json for your project with "actions" in the "skills" attribute set to SERVICE_ACTION.

    Example code: 

     {
   "name": ".MyAVBrowserService",
   "skills": [
     {
       "actions": [
         "action.media.browse.AVBrowserService"
       ]
     }
   ],
   "type": "service",
 }
    Since:
    3
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Multimedia#MEDIA

    • Method Detail

      • onStart

        protected void onStart​(Intent intent)
        Description copied from class: Ability
        Called back when an ability is started for initialization (it can be called only once in the entire lifecycle of an ability).

        Most initialization operations should be performed by calling this method. For example, you can use the current method to call Ability.setMainRoute(java.lang.String) and Ability.addActionRoute(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) to set the main router and action router for a Page ability.

        Overrides:
        onStart in class Ability
        Parameters:
        intent - Indicates information carried when this ability is started. Note: For a Service ability, null is passed.

      • onGetRoot

        public abstract AVBrowserRoot onGetRoot​(String callerPackageName,
                                        int clientUid,
                                        PacMap options)
        Called after the AVBrowser#connect() method to return the information about the root item.
        Parameters:
        callerPackageName - Indicates the bundle name of the application.
        clientUid - Indicates the user ID of the application.
        options - Indicates optional parameters sent to the media browser service when the AVBrowser instance is created.
        Returns:
        Returns the AVBrowserRoot instance; returns null if your application does not have permission to access the root item.
        Since:
        3

      • onLoadAVElementList

        public abstract void onLoadAVElementList​(String parentMediaId,
                                         AVBrowserResult result)
        Called after AVBrowser#subscribeByParentMediaId or notifyAVElementListUpdated(java.lang.String) to return the requested AVBrowserResult instance, including a list of AVElement instances for child media items.
        Parameters:
        parentMediaId - Indicates the ID of the parent media item in the AVBrowserResult instance.
        result - Indicates the AVBrowserResult instance.
        Since:
        3

      • onLoadAVElementList

        public abstract void onLoadAVElementList​(String parentMediaId,
                                         AVBrowserResult result,
                                         PacMap options)
        Called after AVBrowser#subscribeByParentMediaId or notifyAVElementListUpdated(java.lang.String) to return the requested AVBrowserResult instance and media browser service parameters. The AVBrowserResult includes a list of AVElement instances for child media items.
        Parameters:
        parentMediaId - Indicates the ID of the parent media item in the AVBrowserResult instance.
        result - Indicates the AVBrowserResult instance.
        options - Indicates media browser service parameters.
        Since:
        3

      • onLoadAVElement

        public abstract void onLoadAVElement​(String mediaId,
                                     AVBrowserResult result)
        Called after AVBrowser#getAVElement to obtain the AVBrowserResult instance of the AVElement specified by the media item ID.
        Parameters:
        mediaId - Indicates the media item ID.
        result - Indicates the AVBrowserResult instance of the media item.
        Since:
        3

      • getAVToken

        public AVToken getAVToken​()
        Obtains the token for the session between the AVBrowser and this AVBrowserService.
        Returns:
        Returns the session token; returns null if the session is not created or has been destroyed.
        Since:
        3

      • setAVToken

        public void setAVToken​(AVToken token)
        Sets the token for the session between the AVBrowser and this AVBrowserService.
        Parameters:
        token - Indicates the session token.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if token is null.
        IllegalStateException - Throws this exception if this method is called repeatedly to set the token.
        Since:
        3

      • getBrowserOptions

        public final PacMap getBrowserOptions​()
        Obtains the media browser service parameters set when the AVBrowser connects to this AVBrowserService.
        Returns:
        Returns the media browser service parameters.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Throw this exception if this method is not called in the onGetRoot(java.lang.String, int, ohos.utils.PacMap), onLoadAVElementList(java.lang.String, ohos.media.common.sessioncore.AVBrowserResult), or onLoadAVElement(java.lang.String, ohos.media.common.sessioncore.AVBrowserResult) method.
        Since:
        3

      • getCallerUserInfo

        public final AVCallerUserInfo getCallerUserInfo​()
        Obtains information about the remote user who sends the current request.
        Returns:
        Returns the remote user information.
        Since:
        3

      • notifyAVElementListUpdated

        public void notifyAVElementListUpdated​(String parentMediaId)
        Notifies all connected AVBrowser instances that the child media items of the current parent media item have changed.
        Parameters:
        parentMediaId - Indicates the ID of the parent media item.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if parentMediaId is null.
        Since:
        3

      • notifyAVElementListUpdated

        public void notifyAVElementListUpdated​(String parentMediaId,
                                       PacMap options)
        Notifies all connected AVBrowser instances that the child media items of the current parent media item have changed, with media browser service parameters set.
        Parameters:
        parentMediaId - Indicates the ID of the parent media item.
        options - Indicates media browser service parameters.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if parentMediaId or {code options} is null.
        Since:
        3
